body_html:
I have another use-case for the having multiple variables have the same name. (I might be completely misunderstanding something, any help is appreciated)

I want to track some variables in TensorBoard. I am saving the validation loss and training loss (and other things) in separate directories, such that TensorBoard thinks they are from separate runs. The only problem with this approach is that duplicate names get a '_1' appended to the name, so they don't show up in the same plot.

body:
I have another use-case for the having multiple variables have the same name. (I might be completely misunderstanding something, any help is appreciated)

I want to track some variables in TensorBoard. I am saving the validation loss and training loss (and other things) in separate directories, such that TensorBoard thinks they are from separate runs. The only problem with this approach is that duplicate names get a '`_1`' appended to the name, so they don't show up in the same plot.
